item.title: Turns out, you kinda do need a blog
item.description: I read a post a few weeks back espousing the need for a personal blog. If I find that page again, I’ll have it linked here - but the gist of the author’s reasons were this: It’s good for organising thoughts. It makes you a better writer. I am (almost infamously I’m sure) awful at maintaining a blog. The issues that I’ve found with keeping one up to date is that, most of the time, there’s not actually that much going on in my life that I feel is worth making a post about.
